reviewText: This is a very detailed video on how to make the adorable Waldorf Doll. It's like having my own private workshop.
i thought it was a decent video. showed a number of tricks. good for beginner. i would recommend this dvd
My friend loaned me this and I didn't like it. It wasn't helpful to me at all. I'm glad I didn't spend the money buying it. Wouldn't recommend.

This a great tutorial on doll making. It's detailed and done in a way that is easily understood. Great for beginner and the way its done you can easily go to the section you want to review without watching the whole DVD. Greatest purchase I ha be ever made.

I found this DVD very helpful.  It took you through the steps needed to make three of her doll patterns.  The steps were very clear and I liked how she had close-ups of her hands so you could see exactly what she was doing.  The patterns for these dolls are purchased separately, however you can use the techniques you learn for any Waldorf doll pattern.
Included wonderful instructions!!! Watching it done is so helpful!!! You watch a part, then pause and complete the part, then continue!!!!

Glade i order this DVD
She show you step by step how to make the dolls and also lot of helpful tips.
